inclusion.criterion: Plan to remain in the study area/region for at least two months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Are attended by a care giver who is/are able to understand and give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Are at least 5 years old at the time of entry into the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have a history of allergic reaction to any anti-epileptic medications
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have severe acute malnutrition diagnosed based on anthropometric measurements
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He was recently tapered off Dilantin and had no further events during the hospital course.
